body:
Hello everyone, 
I am new to the forums but I have been playing on this server for a while now. This my new account for my youtube channel (https://www.youtube.com/user/EMBYyt), my old account was MattrixMC. To get you guys to know me better I will do an AMA.

replies.body:
As everyone else said, I hope you have fun here :D
Anyways, question time!

Have you ever survived a sharknado?
What's your favorite color and why?
How do you like you potatoes served?
What's your favorite season and why?
If you were a food, what would you be?

Enjoy! :3

replies.body: Welcome to the fourms! Hope you enjoy your stay, and avicus.net/rules
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the fourms! Hope you enjoy your stay, and avicus.net/rules

replies.body:
Don't worry I will have fun :)

I have actually survived two sharknados, one when I was fishing in the Bermuda Triangle and the other when I was skiing down Mt. Everest.
My favourite colour is red, I'm not sure why, I just like it.
I like my potatoes to be served cooked.
My favourite season would probably be summer because you go out and do so many things, and also because daylight savings, so it doesn't go dark until 9pm.
If I was a food I would be a Tic Tac, just because I'm eating one now :)

So that's my life story, I hope you enjoyed!
replies.body_tagged:
